title: Backstage
description: Melissa Parker might just be the luckiest girl on the planet. She’s just turned twenty-one.She’s best friends with The Kind of September.And she’s dating Sam Morneau, everyone’s ultimate celebrity crush. Of course, no one is supposed to know about that. As it turns out, no one is supposed to know about a lot of things that happen behind the scenes of life with the planet’s most popular boy band. Now, what should be Happily Ever After for Mel and Sam is turning into a series of secrets, manipulation, and potential heartbreak... Just in time for The Kind of September’s world tour.
author: Jacqueline E. Smith
